function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of biophilic design and healing environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of disease through global of emphasis on the impact of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of virtual places and their potential role in
